<!-- ðŸŒ³ Earthy Background Style -->
<style>

/* Change background and text color of top navbar */
.navbar {
  background-color: #2c5773 !important;  /* Replace with your preferred color */
  border: none;
}

html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  background: #d1d7c5;
  color: #1f261f;
  position: relative;
}

.background-scene {
  position: fixed;
  z-index: -10;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.sun {
  position: absolute;
  top: 40px;
  right: 60px;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: radial-gradient(circle, #ffdf6c, #ffb300);
  border-radius: 50%;
  box-shadow: 0 0 40px rgba(255, 200, 0, 0.4);
  animation: pulseSun 6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes pulseSun {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 0.9; }
}

.cloud {
  position: absolute;
  top: 80px;
  background: #ffffffcc;
  border-radius: 50px;
  width: 180px;
  height: 60px;
  box-shadow: 60px 0 #ffffffcc, 120px 10px #ffffffcc;
  animation: floatCloud 80s linear infinite;
}

.cloud:nth-child(2) {
  top: 140px;
  left: 40%;
  animation-delay: -30s;
  transform: scale(0.8);
}

@keyframes floatCloud {
  0% { left: -300px; }
  100% { left: 120%; }
}

.mountains {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 350px;
  background: linear-gradient(to top, #4a5e44, transparent 60%);
  clip-path: polygon(0% 100%, 10% 60%, 25% 80%, 40% 50%, 60% 80%, 75% 55%, 90% 75%, 100% 40%, 100% 100%);
  z-index: -9;
}

.waves {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 80px;
  background: #2f4f4f;
  clip-path: ellipse(80% 100% at 50% 100%);
  z-index: -8;
}

.main-container {
  padding: 20px 30px;       /* Reduced padding */
  margin-top: 20px;         /* âœ… Added to move content toward top */
  max-width: 960px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  z-index: 10;
  position: relative;
}

.palclim-logo {
  font-size: 84px;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 26px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.palclim-title {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  max-width: 80%;
}

.palclim-title h1 {
  font-size: 36px;
  margin-bottom: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #2e4728, #132c10);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.palclim-title .subtitle {
  font-size: 18px;
  color: #2f372e;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.palclim-description {
  margin-top: 30px;
  font-size: 18px;
  line-height: 1.85;
  text-align: justify;
  color: #007acc;
}

.support-note {
  font-style: italic;
  color: #007acc;
  margin-top: 16px;
}
</style>
